short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Website Text Mining Companion. Extract text from websites using XPath expressions and download it as a CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text Ninja, your text mining companion!

Text Ninja lets you effortlessly mine text from websites using XPath expressions and export it as a CSV file, ready for easy data/text analysis out of the oven. Say goodbye to manually extracting text from websites and tedious copy-pasting!

Streamline your text mining workflow and unlock the power of web data mining with Text Ninja!

To get the most out of this extension use an expression that targets an element with many instances, like an anchor <a> or a <div>. The text from these elements will be extracted. 

===========================================================

Version 1.0.0
- Initial release
